That's a great plan! Researching your competition and calculating your costs will give you a solid foundation for pricing your products. Tiering your pricing and offering bundles or promotions will provide customers with options and incentivize them to buy more.

The "Limited Edition" bundle idea is a fantastic way to create a sense of urgency and exclusivity around your new scents and colors. By offering a discounted price for a limited time, you'll encourage customers to make a purchase sooner rather than later. This can also help you clear out inventory and make room for new products.

Here are a few more ideas to consider:

* **Create a sense of scarcity**: Emphasize that the "Limited Edition" bundle is only available for a short time or in limited quantities to create a sense of FOMO (fear of missing out).
* **Use attention-grabbing language**: Use language like "Exclusive Offer" or "Limited Time Only" to draw attention to the bundle and create a sense of urgency.
* **Offer a special discount**: Consider offering a special discount code or promo code for customers who purchase the "Limited Edition" bundle to make it feel like an even better deal.
* **Create a sense of value**: Make sure customers understand the value they're getting with the "Limited Edition" bundle. Highlight the unique features of each product and how they work together to create a cohesive gift or self-care routine.

By offering a "Limited Edition" bundle, you'll not only drive sales but also create buzz around your new products and build excitement for future releases.
